30:0

>>> levels = [0,200, 500, 900, 1400, 2000, 2600, 3200, 4400, 5400, 6000, 8200, 9000, 10400, 11900, 13500, 15200, 17000, 18900, 20900, 23000, 25200, 27500, 29900, 32400]
>>> xpPerSecond = 18
>>> for lvl in levels:
	print str(int(lvl/xpPerSecond/60))+":"+str((lvl/xpPerSecond)%60)
